titleStmt.title: Witty apophthegms delivered at several times, and upon several occasions by King James, King Charls, the Marquess of Worcester, Francis Lord Bacon, and Sir Thomas Moor ; collected and revised.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657?
James I, King of England, 1566-1625. Selections. 1669.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649. Selections. 1669.
Worcester, Henry Somerset, Marquis of, 1577-1646. Selections. 1669.
Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626. Selections. 1669.
More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535. Selections. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.R. for Matthew Smelt, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
